document.full_text: jake white, who led south africa to a world cup victory in 2007, will take charge of act brumbies, a super rugby team in australia with a history of player revolts.
document.title: rugby: political skills? new super rugby coach will need them
lines_and_colors: jake white, who led south africa to a world cup victory in 2007, will take charge of act brumbies, a super rugby team in australia with a history of player revolts.
